website_summaries.verdict: A strong and flexible anti-tangle brush from a reliable brand. Satisfied users enjoy more manageable hair.
pros: Great for all types of hair, including curly hair
Can be used wet or dry
It can also be used to brush extensions
cons: Occasional complaints that bristles aren't sturdy enough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purse sized brush
customer_reviews.text: Really there's not much to say about this: it's a hair brush. I could wax poetic about how much better my hair looks after using this, or rave about how it leaves my hair tangle free... But I won't. I purchased this to keep in my purse & my only requirements for this purchase was that it 1) be a hair brush 2) be bright in color so I could find it easily in my hand bag and 3) be small enough to fit in my purse. This fit all three requirements. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was looking fr a detangler read about it on Naturally Curly web site, she said this was an excellent brush for natural hair and she was right. To be honest, I didn't think the fine bristles would work on my 4c hair, I was wrong "it works" believe me.
customer_reviews.author: WOW

customer_reviews.title: Not Drybar
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a real Drybar brush. I have one already and wanted a second. This one smells terrible. Terrible. I have washed it twice and blown it with a dryer and can’t get rid of the smell. The bristles are attached differently to the brush. I would not recommend. Go get a real one from Drybar or a makeup store.
customer_reviews.author: anate

customer_reviews.title: 💓 no fuss, easy use
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this amazing brush! It will get thru anything with no problem! I'm a stylist and have many diff types of hair sit in my chair and this brush is just amazing! Works on em all with no major damages or roughness.💞
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for long thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I go swimming everyday and my hair gets so knotty but with his brush it gets the knots out in minutes. It is a great brush to use in the shower. The bristles work very well and not one single one has fallen out. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor description, overpaid.
customer_reviews.text: This was poorly described. It is the mini hairbrush not the full size. The full size is $20. The mini size is only $12.....
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Borgstrom

customer_reviews.title: Over rates
customer_reviews.text: Over rated brush. In few days some of bristols came off.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good for 3b hair texture
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy brush and bristles. Combed through one of my daughter's 3b hair very well, not as good with my older daughter's 4b hair, but still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Scam!
customer_reviews.text: The brush that arrived was doll size. The dimensions are completely wrong. I bought the purse size for $17 less.
customer_reviews.author: Casaeditore

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. I have hair extensions so I’m really picky with brushes and I saw this one on Instagram- I love my drybar hairdryer and am loving this brush. Great for thick hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good brush for my long,thick hair and am so glad I purchased this brush-it works great!definetly would buy again ,well worth it-very happy!
customer_reviews.author: valerie makris

customer_reviews.title: What a great brush! Has lasted forever and it doesn't hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great brush! Has lasted forever and it doesn't hurt when I need to get the tangles out of my daughters hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ratkovich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hair brush.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair brush I've come across. Brushes well, does not tangle and really soft. This is my third one. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: so gentle but firm
customer_reviews.text: this brush feels like my mom's fingers running through my head to put me to sleep when i was 4 years old. It's so gentle and smooth. Worth the price. I never brushed or combed my hair until now
customer_reviews.author: Jensy

customer_reviews.title: Great for wavy hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is wavy and this brush is perfect for it. It detangles dry or wet hair and massages in the process
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Diaz

customer_reviews.title: For sure better on my hair
customer_reviews.text: I can tell this is better on my hair than other brushes. It doesn’t rip through and break hair like plastic ones, I’ve noticed. Even if my hair is tangly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for wet or dry hair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second brush. It is so easy on tangles and light and easy to handle while blow drying or styling your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is much more sturdy than the cheaper brands offered on this site
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Balle

customer_reviews.title: good basic brush
customer_reviews.text: ok, great color, no better than regular wet brush. could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush - goes through hair easily - works well with blow dryer
customer_reviews.author: Barb D

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and it was exactly what I order. Recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! Great for getting tangles out of thin hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jill V

customer_reviews.title: Great detangler
customer_reviews.text: Great brush and have used this line for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the bristles fall down every time I use this brush! frustrating... .
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the Wet brush but it gets the job done better. It detangles with ease. One star off because it arrived stained in black. For that price you expect it to be unpolluted.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I thought - how different could it be?? Well, it is different and It’s wonderful! I have long wavy-curly hair, this doesn’t pull or yank, even when I have lots of product. The last product gave me Frizzy hair and split ends - nightmare!!! This Feels great on my scalp too.
customer_reviews.author: cesca

customer_reviews.title: Works on very long, thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long, thick wavy hair and I usually have a hard time getting a brush through my hair without pulling and tugging. When my sister-in-law recommended dry bar brush to me I was intrigued and had to try it. I've been using it for a while now and I absolutely love it! It goes through my hair smoothly, no tugging/pulling and I can brush it with ease. I would definitely recommend this brush to anyone! Worth the price and no need for detangler spray! BONUS!
customer_reviews.author: jamie tortorella

customer_reviews.title: Peeling!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brush it’s the best one I’ve ever owned. But for some reason it recently has begun to peel off some sort of outer layer on the brush. It’s a great brush and I’m sad it started to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Fregoe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brush
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hairbrush for 5 hrs and have given as gifts My hair is fine, but very thick. I like this brush because it is gentle, and yet goes easily thru my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair and this brush isn’t a very good detangler for me. But it’s gentle and great for styling. I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works like any other similar brush but with the DryBar name
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for a basic brush but as expected. Matches my other brushes and dryer so I caved and paid the premium for the DryBar brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It is a great brush!
customer_reviews.text: .i get really bad tangles due to frizzing though and i thought this brush would stop the breakage I experience when detangling my hair. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ... BRUSHES FOR ME AND MY DAUGHTER AND THE SMELLED TERRIBLE. THESE BRUSHES SMELL LIKE "CAR TIRES" DO NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT TWO BRUSHES FOR ME AND MY DAUGHTER AND THE SMELLED TERRIBLE. THESE BRUSHES SMELL LIKE "CAR TIRES" DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Kalola

customer_reviews.title: love this hair brush
customer_reviews.text: I love how it easily detangles my hair wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: my favorite brush
customer_reviews.text: this brush will cut down on frizz and help detangle. I really like it because you can use it on wet or dry hair and I absolutely can tell a difference after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bennannie

customer_reviews.title: I've use this type of brush everyday for years and never had one become useless so fast
customer_reviews.text: This brush lasted about 4 weeks. The pins collapsed into the body. I've use this type of brush everyday for years and never had one become useless so fast.
customer_reviews.author: BirdLady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush really does get the tangles out. I was amazed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair, no pain.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this so far. He has ling curly hair that tangles very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best brush ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: i have used so many brushes and ive never had one quite like this. i have naturally curls hair and every brush makes my hair so frizzy and this one doesn't. the bristles arent too hard but nor are they too flimsy. it is an amazing brush and i 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J. Zeh

customer_reviews.title: this helped me so much i love the brush it takes ALL my knots out and ...
customer_reviews.text: this helped me so much i love the brush it takes ALL my knots out and i have a lot LOVE THIS BRUSH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: I beg of you, do not waste your money on this. You can get a wet brush for $7 and it will do the exact same thing
customer_reviews.author: SophiesKingdom2

customer_reviews.title: Best brush
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best brush I have ever used. It really dr tangles my very fine, easily knotted hair, even wet. Will always keep one of these around.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is rather short, so I can't speak to the de-tangling aspect of this brush, but it feels great on the scalp, is nicely balanced, and appears to be well made. It comes in a nice box, appropriate for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Rush

customer_reviews.title: Best Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best brush ever. I have three of them. I have hair that gets super tangled, especially after I shower. This brush is able to brush through my hair so easy and with minimal pain. Works way better for me than the Wet Brush.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lafo Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Detangler Brush
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Detangles wet hair and doesn't pull it out. It smoothly glides through the hair.
customer_reviews.author: SwingKat

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! Shop around for best price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairbrush. Bristles are soft and it works great as a detangler on my thick, wavy hair. I can even use it when my hair is wet and I don't end up with tons of pulling, pain, or split ends. I swear the bristles must be coated or something they are so soft. I want to get another to keep in my travel bag. I will get mine from Sephora, though, as Amazon's prices for this and other drybar items are outrageous! $16 for the full size at Sephora and $10 for the small one. Sephora also often offers free shipping and it's usually pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Evan

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever
customer_reviews.text: What can I say...Bristles disappear into the brush...or they snap off in your hair...4C curls...Just a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Zen 7

customer_reviews.title: Literally the worst brush I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst brush I've ever used. This is coming from someone who buys brushes from the dollar store regularly. The design of this brush is so flawed that brushing my hair causes the bristles to be pushed into the brush. Thus making it unable to brush my hair. Within seconds I'm just pressing a paddle with some plastic nubs against my scalp. It's almost like some sort of gag gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best detanglar brush
customer_reviews.text: I like that it, mine does at least, truly detangles my hair on the first try. I have had much more expensive brushes, but this has quickly become my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: MSJ

customer_reviews.title: I didn't know you could love a hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: Works really great! I have long thick hair, down to the small of my back. I brush my hair in less than 2 minutes wet or dry. I plan on purchasing another. It is cheaper on sephora, I got it there for $15
customer_reviews.author: First Name

product_meta.title: Drybar The Super Lemon Drop Detangling Hair Brush
feature_bullets: Drybar's Super Lemon Drop is the ultimate detangler for wet OR dry hair that works through tangles without tugging or pulling.
Flexible bristles work through tangles without pulling or tugging.
Soft-touch finish is comfortable and slip-free. Great for all hair types, including extensions.

HOW TO USE: For wet and dry hair, start by brushing out the ends and work your way up to the crown. For extensions, hold the hair below the top of the extension and brush away tangles. This helps to avoid unnecessary tugging.

Created for the perfect blowout. Our philosophy is simple: Focus on one thing and be the best at it. For us that's blowouts! We created a full line of hair products and tools to achieve and maintain the perfect blowout.
